means: 紧缩指数，消除通货膨胀指数，减缩指数

sentence.Network_en: You vent your BC using the deflator valve and concentrate on breathing shallowly.
sentence.Network_cn: 你通过使用排气阀调节你的浮力调整器,同时集中精力进行微微的呼吸.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 但是另一方面， 消费支出的平减指数（deflator） 下跌幅度则并没有缩小， 2003 年第二季的消费支出平减指数仍比去年同期下跌 2. …

means.word_mean: 1. a statistical factor designed to remove the effect of inflation; inflation adjusted variables are in constant dollars

auth_sentence.content: Perhaps his officials could enlighten us about that when they tackle the GDP deflator issue.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Perhaps his officials could enlighten us about that when they tackle the GDP deflator issue.

auth_sentence.content: Currently, the GDP deflator is 1.8%, which hardly reflects the true rise in prices.
auth_sentence.res_content: Currently, the GDP deflator is 1.8%, which hardly reflects the true rise in prices.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Currently, the GDP deflator is 1.8%, which hardly reflects the true rise in prices.

auth_sentence.content: Finally, the GDP deflator reported for 3Q2011 is expected to be only 4.3% higher than it was in 3Q2008.
auth_sentence.res_content: Finally, the GDP deflator reported for 3Q2011 is expected to be only 4.3% higher than it was in 3Q2008.
